Class Loan

  • java.lang.Object
    • Loan
  • public class Loan
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Loan entity. This class encapsulates the attributes and functionalities of a loan.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected double principal
      The principal amount of the loan.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new Loan object with the specified parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Loan

        public Loan​(double principal,
            float interestRate,
            int duration,
            java.lang.String loanType,
            java.lang.String guarantorName,
            double guarantorID,
            double guarantorIncome,
            int guarantorContactNo,
            Account account,
            java.lang.String loanStatus)
        Constructs a new Loan object with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        principal - The principal amount of the loan.
        interestRate - The interest rate of the loan.
        duration - The duration of the loan.
        loanType - The type of loan.
        guarantorName - The name of the guarantor.
        guarantorID - The ID of the guarantor.
        guarantorIncome - The income of the guarantor.
        guarantorContactNo - The contact number of the guarantor.
        account - The account object associated with the loan.
        loanStatus - The status of the loan.

      • approveLoan

        public void approveLoan()
        Approves the loan and sets its status to "Approved". Prints a confirmation message.

      • rejectLoan

        public void rejectLoan()
        Rejects the loan and sets its status to "Rejected". Prints a rejection message.

      • printLoanDetails

        public void printLoanDetails()
        Displays the details of the loan, including ID, principal amount, duration, loan type, balance, monthly payment, guarantor name, guarantor ID, guarantor income, guarantor contact number, and eligibility for loan approval.

      • isEligibleForLoan

        public boolean isEligibleForLoan()
        Checks if the loan is eligible for approval. This method provides a default implementation and can be overridden by subclasses.
        Returns:
        true if the loan is eligible for approval, false otherwise.
